title: replay
body: i want to see/record some clips from my gameplays but i played too much games to be on match history can u help me plz?

replies.body: I hate to give the bad news, but because today is a new patch those replays would no longer be compatible anyway.  It would also be unavailable if past your current history.  :(  It's super important that you save up any replays you want right away by creating highlights.  Our[ Replays guide ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/234965248-Replays-FAQ-Pro-Tips)should help with that, but definitely act quick!
